definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Of the tree which grew by the tomb, near the head of Kalos, they also spoke.
sentences.chinese: 他們還談到了喀洛斯枕邊的那棵墳頭樹。

sentences.english: There is a wooden cross on his grave.
sentences.chinese: 在他的墳頭上有一個木頭十字架。

sentences.english: People visit their ancestors' Graves to sweep away the dirt.
sentences.chinese: 人們到先人的墳頭上掃墓。

sentences.english: Because of grave-damps falling round my head?
sentences.chinese: 因墳頭溼氣降臨我頭顱。

sentences.english: Plant thou no rose at my head.
Its grave mound no tombstone, only a dazzling grass.
sentences.chinese: 它的墳頭沒有墓碑，只有一棵綠綠的小草。

sentences.english: Here upon my true love's grave.
Plant thou no roses at my head.
sentences.chinese: 不要在我墳頭栽種玫瑰。
